description:
## Got this problem? 


![Disable Office Activtion Prompt Screenshot](https://support.content.office.net/en-us/media/95750f4a-43ce-4b0e-9428-5aba7782be39.png)	
##This package disables the Office activation prompt caused by OEM installs of Office that have been replaced by other Office versions.

[More info from Microsoft](https://support.office.com/en-us/article/Office-repeatedly-prompts-you-to-activate-on-a-new-PC-a9a6b05f-f6ce-4d1f-8d49-eb5007b64ba1)

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/disableofficenag-winconfig/readme.md)**
summary: This package disables Office 2013 and 2016 activation prompts from OEM installs.
author: bcurran3
